javascript.name: Javascript
javascript.description: The native language of web browsers. Javascript is an extremely popular language that has many different, widely used libraries and frameworks. I have experience with Jquery, NodeJS, Webpack, Angular and React.

ruby.name: Ruby
ruby.description: A fast, clean programming language, with easy to read syntax. Many languages try to emulate Ruby's human-readablility and style of organization. Learning Ruby is what helped me develope strong programming fundamentals. I also have some experience with Rails as well.

sql.name: SQL
sql.description: Databases have been an integral part of my learning experience. Using basic SQL language can be a challenge, but with technologies like active record, it is much more manageable. I have built applictions that have required me to map data across multiple databases.
